text: Karbala was a town of ancient Cappadocia, inhabited in Byzantine times. It is the birthplace of Gregory of Nazianzus. Its site is located near Güzelyurt, Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cappadocia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Aksaray Province
title: Karbala (Cappadocia)
